com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Interface AjaxTrigger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable, WComponent, WebComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RadioButtonGroup, UicProfileButton, WButton, WCancelButton, WCheckBox, WCheckBoxSelect, WConfirmationButton, WDateField, WDropdown, WEmailField, WMenuItem, WMultiDropdown, WMultiFileWidget, WMultiSelect, WMultiSelectPair, WMultiTextField, WNumberField, WPartialDateField, WPasswordField, WPhoneNumberField, WPrintButton, WRadioButtonSelect, WShuffler, WSingleSelect, WTextArea, WTextField, WToggleButton, WTree

    public interface AjaxTrigger
extends WComponent

    This interface is used to mark components which are able to trigger an AJAX request.

    NOTE: Components must not implement this interface unless they already support client-side AJAX triggering. Implementing this interface does NOT automatically enable a component to be used an AJAX trigger.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
